page.title: 17A MORNING IN LYNDSAYS LIFE
page.content: In the morning when I wake up,I sit in bed for a minute then I get some clothes from my wardrobe and put them on my bed.I get washed,then put the television on.I leave my bed unmade and my pyjamas in the room but the rest of the bedroom is tidy.I have my Rice Crispies and go back upstairs to watch television.If my little sister wakes up its trouble,first I have to make her breakfast and make her a bottle of tea.Then I tell her to wake up my big sister Sarah so she goes running into her bedroom and shouts "Sarah" and hits her.When I have finished watching television and my mum and dad are up I go into the Beer Garden and play.Then I call for my next door neighbour and play with her at tennis.Sometimes we play in a tent that her dad has made us.Then I go in for dinner,a sandwich and some crisps.
